授業目的:
The Modern UK
The purpose of this course is to familiarize students with some major events that took place in The UK since the 1950s.
到達目標:
Students will be able to explain some major events that took place in The UK since the 1950s.
Students will be able to assess the importance these events had to world culture
特記事項: この授業を履修するには、事前にレベル認定の申請が必要です。詳細は備考欄を確認してください。
